name: part_009
file: tmp_【初3DLIVE】キミの王子様☆青くんのお誕生日ライブ！ゲスト盛沢山！【#⁠火威青生誕祭2025】 [PyQ4-6-TeRI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Ao-kun and ReGLOSS celebrate and perform their group introduction.
Each ReGLOSS member gives a unique and humorous self-introduction.
The members start causing chaos on the stage, breaking furniture and props while Ao-kun tries to maintain order.

subtitles.original: 最高！おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Awesome! Congratulations!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you so much. Thank you.

subtitles.original: あ、じゃあ自己紹介するか？
subtitles.english: Ah, shall we introduce ourselves?

subtitles.original: うん。
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: いくぞ！レジトップ！We are...
subtitles.english: Here we go! Regi-top! We are...

subtitles.original: ReGLOSS!
subtitles.english: ReGLOSS!

subtitles.original: 全然違うんだよ。
subtitles.english: That's not it at all.

subtitles.original: え、なんで？こうじゃないの？
subtitles.english: Eh, why? Isn't it like this?

subtitles.original: 俺らいつこれが揃うんだよ...
subtitles.english: When are we ever going to get this in sync...?

subtitles.original: ま、いっか。せっかくなんで自己紹介お願いいたします。
subtitles.english: Well, whatever. Since we're here, please introduce yourselves.

subtitles.original: はーい！
subtitles.english: Okay!

subtitles.original: じゃあ奏からいきます！
subtitles.english: I'll go first then!

subtitles.original: たまたま友達に誘われてライブ会場に来てみたら...
subtitles.english: I happened to be invited by a friend and came to a live venue...

subtitles.original: あれ、青さんの誕生日ライブでした！
subtitles.english: Wait, it turned out to be Ao-san's birthday live!

subtitles.original: おめでとう！ラッキーガール！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Congratulations! Lucky girl! Yay!

subtitles.original: そして？
subtitles.english: And?

subtitles.original: はーい、どうも！可愛いポジティブジーニアス、一条莉々華だよ！
subtitles.english: Hi there! I'm the cute positive genius, Ichijou Ririka!

subtitles.original: 家でゲームをしてて、「ああ、このイケメン画面から出てこないかな」って...
subtitles.english: I was playing games at home, thinking 'Man, I wish this handsome guy would come out of the screen'...

subtitles.original: 画面を割ったらここに繋がっちゃったみたい！わあ！
subtitles.english: ...and when I broke the screen, it seems I got connected here! Wow!

subtitles.original: ゲームの中から？！これ褒められてんのこれ？
subtitles.english: From inside a game?! Is that supposed to be a compliment?

subtitles.original: ま、いっか。そして？
subtitles.english: Well, whatever. And?

subtitles.original: はい！儒烏風亭一番は、ReGLOSSの賑やかしネタ枠担当、儒烏風亭らでんでございます！
subtitles.english: Yes! Juufuutei number one, the one in charge of ReGLOSS's noisy gags, Juufuutei Raden!

subtitles.original: えっと、シャンパンの伝票がこちらになりますので...
subtitles.english: Um, here is the slip for the champagne...

subtitles.original: あ、ありがとうございます。あ、カゴに置いときます。
subtitles.english: Ah, thank you. I'll just put it in the basket.

subtitles.original: なになに？シャンパン下ろしたの、らでんちゃんが？
subtitles.english: What? Did Raden-chan order champagne?

subtitles.original: おいこら！あああ...
subtitles.english: Hey! Aaa...

subtitles.original: そして？
subtitles.english: And?

subtitles.original: プンプンプン！ReGLOSSの番長、轟はじめれっち！
subtitles.english: Pun-pun-pun! ReGLOSS's leader, Todoroki Hajime-lecch!

subtitles.original: なんかポーズ可愛いな。今？
subtitles.english: That pose is kinda cute. Is it new?

subtitles.original: ずっとやってるよ！あ、そうなの？
subtitles.english: She's been doing it! Oh, really?

subtitles.original: 今初めて視認したわ。お披露目からずっとやってるよ。
subtitles.english: I just noticed it for the first time. I've been doing it since debut.

subtitles.original: やってたよ！やばい。
subtitles.english: She was doing it! No way.

subtitles.original: で？こんちゃ、この流れがちょっともうわかんなくなっちゃってる...
subtitles.english: And? Hello... I don't really get this flow anymore...

subtitles.original: クチョから生まれた、轟はじめれっち！
subtitles.english: Born from a beetle, Todoroki Hajime-lecch!

subtitles.original: クチョから生まれたんだ。あ、ありがとう。
subtitles.english: So you were born from a beetle. Ah, thanks.

subtitles.original: 生まれてきてくれてありがとう。ガラスの靴やな。
subtitles.english: Thanks for being born. Glass slippers, huh.

subtitles.original: ちょっと姫姫ってことやね。なるほどですね。
subtitles.english: So you're like a princess. I see.

subtitles.original: てかステージめっちゃいいやん！
subtitles.english: Anyway, the stage is great!

subtitles.original: どうしょこれ！Blue Fireってこと？そう！
subtitles.english: Look at this! Is it Blue Fire? Yes!

subtitles.original: あのなんか、乙待ちとかで使ったあれ...大丈夫かな？
subtitles.english: Um, the stuff used for Otsumachi... is it okay?

subtitles.original: なんか不安だな。すごい！乙待ち思い出すね！
subtitles.english: I'm a bit worried. Amazing! It reminds me of Otsumachi!

subtitles.original: ちょっと思い出さないでほしいけどね、それは。
subtitles.english: I'd rather you didn't remember that, though.

subtitles.original: いいよ、これ！あ、いいでしょうその椅子。
subtitles.english: This is good! Ah, that chair is nice, isn't it.

subtitles.original: え、なにしてんの？なにしてんの？
subtitles.english: Eh, what are you doing? What are you doing?

subtitles.original: わあ！奏ちゃん！
subtitles.english: Whoa! Kanade-chan!

subtitles.original: 暴れてる！暴れてる！え、待って、でもお酒はあるよ。
subtitles.english: She's going wild! Going wild! Wait, but we have alcohol.

subtitles.original: お酒飲んでもいい？誰か止めて！誰か止めて！
subtitles.english: Can I drink? Someone stop her! Someone stop her!

subtitles.original: おいしー！あ、あ、ああ...
subtitles.english: It's good! Ah, ah, aaa...

subtitles.original: 莉々華ちゃん！待て待て！やってないやってないって！
subtitles.english: Ririka-chan! Wait wait! Don't do it!

subtitles.original: 言ってるだろうが！あー！
subtitles.english: I told you not to! Aah!

subtitles.original: どうするのこの後の段々...
subtitles.english: What are we going to do about the next part...?

subtitles.original: 奏！何してんだよ！
subtitles.english: Kanade! What are you doing!

subtitles.original: バイオレンス！
subtitles.english: Violence!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: なんで、もう破天荒なこと...そんなことやろうとしてない！
subtitles.english: Why such reckless things... I didn't plan for any of this!

subtitles.original: えい！えい！えい！えい！
subtitles.english: Ei! Ei! Ei! Ei!

subtitles.original: まどまど！らでんちゃん！ごめん、それもうみんなやってる。
subtitles.english: Wait! Raden-chan! Sorry, everyone's already doing that.

subtitles.original: （無言）
subtitles.english: (Silence)

subtitles.original: あ、それもやってる。ああ...
subtitles.english: Ah, that's also been done. Aah...

subtitles.original: でも番長はね...番長はもう何もやらないよね？
subtitles.english: But Bancho... Bancho won't do anything, right?

subtitles.original: 信じてるよ、番長。さすがにね。
subtitles.english: I trust you, Bancho. As expected.

subtitles.original: あー！やー！
subtitles.english: Ah! Yaah!

subtitles.original: これ高いのに！めっちゃ綺麗なんだよ！
subtitles.english: This was expensive! It's so beautiful!

subtitles.original: 暴れるな暴れるな！あー！
subtitles.english: Don't go wild! Aah!

subtitles.original: おい！青くんが壊した！破天荒になっちゃった！
subtitles.english: Hey! Ao-kun broke it! He's gone reckless!

subtitles.original: あーあ...この後もまだまだあったのに...もう終わりだね。
subtitles.english: Aah... there was still so much more to come... it's over now.

subtitles.original: 終わりだね。終わりじゃない！
subtitles.english: It's over. No it's not!

subtitles.original: お前たち全員、この後ステージ...お疲れ様でした！
subtitles.english: All of you, after this on stage... Good job today!

subtitles.original: 台本あんねん！聞け！
subtitles.english: I have a script! Listen!

subtitles.original: この後もステージ直すの、君たちにも手伝ってもらうからな！
subtitles.english: You're going to help me fix the stage afterwards too!

subtitles.original: えーー？！
subtitles.english: Eeeeh?!

subtitles.original: ということで。しょうがないな。
subtitles.english: And so. It can't be helped.

subtitles.original: なんかすごい賑やかですけれども...ま、一生言うか。
subtitles.english: It's quite lively, but... well, let's just say it.

subtitles.original: この生誕祭はゴリゴリだ！
subtitles.english: This birthday festival is hardcore!

subtitles.original: 女々しくて 女々しくて 女々しくて
subtitles.english: Memeshikute, Memeshikute, Memeshikute

subtitles.original: 辛いよー！
subtitles.english: It's painful!

subtitles.original: 僕の事からかったの？あんなに「好き」と言ったのに
subtitles.english: Were you just teasing me? Even though you said you 'liked' me so much

subtitles.original: 奴のどこを気に入ったの？
subtitles.english: What did you see in that guy?
